H0.text: Sediments are what waves deposit to form sandbars and barrier islands.

H1.text: Magma is what waves deposit to form sandbars and barrier islands.

H2.text: Organisms are what waves deposit to form sandbars and barrier islands.

H3.text: Glaciers are what waves deposit to form sandbars and barrier islands.

A4.text: Wave-dominated islands require an abundant supply of sediment to grow and develop dunes.

A5.text: The flow of a tidal prism moves sand.
